brand_info.name: Automobili Lamborghini
brand_info.positioning: An ultra-luxury super sports car brand defined by extreme design, cutting-edge performance, and bold Italian character, positioned as an icon of uncompromising emotion and visual power.
brand_info.vision: To shape the future of super sports cars through revolutionary design, advanced technology, and unmistakable emotional impact.
brand_info.mission: Create the most daring and technologically advanced super sports cars, delivering extreme performance and a visceral driving experience.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 1963 by Ferruccio Lamborghini in Sant’Agata Bolognese, Italy, Automobili Lamborghini was born from the ambition to challenge established sports car conventions with radical design and engineering.

brand_values.brand_promise: Deliver an uncompromising super sports car experience defined by power, design, and emotional intensity.
differentiators: Naturally aspirated and high-performance powertrains as brand signatures.
non_negotiables: Design must be radical and unmistakable.
Performance must feel extreme and emotional.
Brand attitude must remain bold and non-conformist.

psychographics.lifestyle: Collectors and high-net-worth individuals drawn to extreme aesthetics, power, and status symbolism.
psychographics.behavior: Purchases driven by emotional desire, personalization, and brand symbolism; strong collector culture.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Declarative, dramatic, and emotionally charged, celebrating power, speed, and design without restraint.

logo.primary_logo: Lamborghini raging bull shield and wordmark.
logo.usage_rules: Strict adherence to proportions, colors, and clear space.
logo.lockup_behavior: Shield and wordmark used with authority; never decorative.
logo.safe_area: Defined by official Lamborghini brand standards.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Black and yellow as dominant identity anchors, supported by aggressive contrasts.

style.camera_feel: High-impact imagery emphasizing sharp lines, low angles, and visual dominance.
style.pose_guidelines: Cars shot low, wide, and aggressive; humans secondary or absent.
style.casting_attitude: Drivers portrayed as assertive and dominant when present.

technical.lighting: Hard, directional lighting with strong highlights.
technical.color_grading: High-contrast with deep blacks and saturated accents.

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Vehicle stance, design lines, and presence prioritized.

test_zone: Hybrid and electric super sports cars

print.cover_rules: Full-bleed vehicle imagery with minimal text

logo_misuse_examples: Color changes to the bull shield
